# __Rise in the amount of health data generated by iot devices__

## Articles mentionning the risk

* [Allam_coronavirus_2020](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Article/PBN__Article_388.md)

## Mitigations of this risk

* [Implementation of robust data security measures, including encryption, access control, and user consent mechanisms](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Mitigation/PBN__Mitigation_5683.md)

## Name of the risk

Increased risk of data privacy and security breaches, potential misuse of health data

## People affected by this risk

* [And the public](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Stakeholder/PBN__Stakeholder_31.md)
* [Healthcare professionals](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Stakeholder/PBN__Stakeholder_32.md)
* [Patients](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Stakeholder/PBN__Stakeholder_3083.md)

## Stakeholders who can mitigate this risk

* [Healthcare organizations](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Stakeholder/PBN__Stakeholder_216.md)
* [Technology providers](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Stakeholder/PBN__Stakeholder_628.md)

## Technologies linked to the risk

* [Access control mechanisms](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Technology/PBN__Technology_344.md)
* [Data encryption](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Technology/PBN__Technology_150.md)
* [User consent frameworks](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Technology/PBN__Technology_4480.md)

## This Risk belongs to this RiskGroup

* [Technological risks](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/RiskGroup/PBN__RiskGroup_8.md)
